text: Mogi das Cruzes is an Brazilian municipality in the state of São Paulo. 450,785 people lived here in 2020 and has an area of 713 km².Instituto Brasileiro de Geografia e Estatística It is 40 km to the east of the city of São Paulo. It was founded in 1560 by the bandeirantes. Football player Neymar, plays for Paris Saint-Germain and Brazilian national team, was born here. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Cities in São Paulo (state)
title: Mogi das Cruzes
